register.name: FPEXC
register.description: Provides a global enable for the Advanced SIMD and Floating-point (VFP) functionality, and indicates how the state of this functionality is recorded.

bitField.name: EX
bitField.description: Exception bit.

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: Enables PL2, PL1, and PL0 accesses to the SIMD and floating-point registers, except for the following:

bitField.name: DEX
bitField.description: Defined synchronous instruction exception bit.

bitField.name: FP2V
bitField.description: FPINST2 instruction valid bit. In ARMv8, this field is always RES0.

bitField.name: VV
bitField.description: VECITR valid bit. In ARMv8, this field is always RES0.

bitField.name: TFV
bitField.description: Trapped Fault Valid bit.

bitField.name: VECITR
bitField.description: Vector iteration count. In ARMv8, this field is always RES1.

bitField.name: IDF
bitField.description: Input Denormal trapped exception bit, or IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. The meaning of this bit depends on the value of FPEXC.TFV.

bitField.name: IXF
bitField.description: Inexact trapped exception bit, or IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. The meaning of this bit depends on the value of FPEXC.TFV.

bitField.name: UFF
bitField.description: Underflow trapped exception bit, or IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. The meaning of this bit depends on the value of FPEXC.TFV.

bitField.name: OFF
bitField.description: Overflow trapped exception bit, or IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. The meaning of this bit depends on the value of FPEXC.TFV.

bitField.name: DZF
bitField.description: Divide-by-zero trapped exception bit, or IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. The meaning of this bit depends on the value of FPEXC.TFV.

bitField.name: IOF
bitField.description: Invalid Operation trapped exception bit, or IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. The meaning of this bit depends on the value of FPEXC.TFV.

register.name: FPSCR
register.description: Provides floating-point system status information and control.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Negative condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Zero condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Overflow condition flag. This is updated by floating-point comparison operations.

bitField.name: QC
bitField.description: Cumulative saturation bit, Advanced SIMD only. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that an Advanced SIMD integer operation has saturated since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: AHP
bitField.description: Alternative half-precision control bit:

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default NaN mode control bit:

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Flush-to-zero mode control bit:

bitField.name: RMode
bitField.description: Rounding Mode control field.

bitField.name: Stride
bitField.description: It is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED whether this field is RW or RAZ.

bitField.name: Len
bitField.description: It is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED whether this field is RW or RAZ.

bitField.name: IDE
bitField.description: Input Denormal exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IXE
bitField.description: Inexact exception trap enable.

bitField.name: UFE
bitField.description: Underflow exception trap enable.

bitField.name: OFE
bitField.description: Overflow exception trap enable.

bitField.name: DZE
bitField.description: Division by Zero exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IOE
bitField.description: Invalid Operation exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IDC
bitField.description: Input Denormal cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Input Denormal exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: IXC
bitField.description: Inexact cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Inexact exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: UFC
bitField.description: Underflow cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Underflow exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: OFC
bitField.description: Overflow cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Overflow exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: DZC
bitField.description: Division by Zero cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Division by Zero exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: IOC
bitField.description: Invalid Operation cumulative exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Invalid Operation exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

register.name: FPSID
register.description: Provides top-level information about the floating-point implementation.

bitField.name: Implementer
bitField.description: Implementer codes are the same as those used for the MIDR.

bitField.name: SW
bitField.description: Software bit.

bitField.name: Subarchitecture
bitField.description: Subarchitecture version number.

bitField.name: PartNum
bitField.description: An IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED part number for the floating-point implementation, assigned by the implementer.

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: An IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED variant number. Typically, this field distinguishes between different production variants of a single product.

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: An IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED revision number for the floating-point implementation.

register.name: MVFR0
register.description: Describes the features provided by the AArch32 Advanced SIMD and Floating-point implementation.

bitField.name: FPRound
bitField.description: Floating-Point Rounding modes. Indicates the rounding modes supported by the VFP floating-point hardware.

bitField.name: FPShVec
bitField.description: Short Vectors. Indicates the hardware support for ARMv6 VFP short vectors.

bitField.name: FPSqrt
bitField.description: Square Root. Indicates the hardware support for the ARMv6 VFP square root operations.

bitField.name: FPDivide
bitField.description: Indicates the hardware support for VFP divide operations.

bitField.name: FPTrap
bitField.description: Floating Point Exception Trapping. Indicates whether the VFP hardware implementation supports exception trapping.

bitField.name: FPDP
bitField.description: Double Precision. Indicates the hardware support for VFP double-precision operations.

bitField.name: FPSP
bitField.description: Single Precision. Indicates the hardware support for VFP single-precision operations.

bitField.name: SIMDReg
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD registers. Indicates support for the Advanced SIMD register bank.

register.name: MVFR1
register.description: Describes the features provided by the AArch32 Advanced SIMD and Floating-point implementation.

bitField.name: SIMDFMAC
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Fused Multiply-Accumulate. Indicates whether the floating-point and Advanced SIMD implementation includes the fused multiply accumulate instructions.

bitField.name: FPHP
bitField.description: Floating Point Half Precision. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDHP
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Half Precision. Indicates whether the floating-point and Advanced SIMD implementation provides half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDSP
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Single Precision. Indicates whether the floating-point and Advanced SIMD implementation provides single-precision floating-point instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDInt
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Integer. Indicates whether the floating-point and Advanced SIMD implementation provides integer instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDLS
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Load/Store. Indicates whether the floating-point and Advanced SIMD implementation provides load/store instructions.

bitField.name: FPDNaN
bitField.description: Default NaN mode. Indicates whether the VFP hardware implementation supports only the Default NaN mode.

bitField.name: FPFtZ
bitField.description: Flush to Zero mode. Indicates whether the VFP hardware implementation supports only the Flush-to-Zero mode of operation.

register.name: MVFR2
register.description: Describes the features provided by the AArch32 Advanced SIMD and Floating-point implementation.

bitField.name: FPMisc
bitField.description: Indicates support for miscellaneous VFP features.

bitField.name: SIMDMisc
bitField.description: Indicates support for miscellaneous Advanced SIMD features.

tcf:enumItem.description: The only significant state is the contents of the registers D0 - D31, FPSCR, and FPEXC. A context switch can be performed by saving and restoring the values of these registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_only_significant_state_is_the_contents_of_the_registers_D0_D31_FPSCR_and_FPEXC

tcf:enumItem.description: There is additional state that must be handled by any context switch system.
tcf:enumItem.name: There_is_additional_state_that_must_be_handled_by_any_context_switch_system

tcf:enumItem.description: PL2, PL1, and PL0 accesses to the FPSCR, and any of the SIMD and floating-point registers Q0-Q15, including their views as D0-D31 registers or S0-S31 registers, are UNDEFINED.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL2_PL1_and_PL0_accesses_to_the_FPSCR_and_any_of_the_SIMD_and_floating_point_registers_Q0_Q15_including_their_views_as_D0_D31_registers_or_S0_S31_registers_are_UNDEFINED

tcf:enumItem.description: PL2, PL1, and PL0 accesses are enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL2_PL1_and_PL0_accesses_are_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: A synchronous exception occurred when processing an unallocated floating-point or Advanced SIMD instruction.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_synchronous_exception_occurred_when_processing_an_unallocated_floating_point_or_Advanced_SIMD_instruction

tcf:enumItem.description: A synchronous exception occurred on an allocated floating-point instruction that encountered an exceptional condition.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_synchronous_exception_occurred_on_an_allocated_floating_point_instruction_that_encountered_an_exceptional_condition

tcf:enumItem.description: FPEXC bits[7, 4:0] have an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED meaning
tcf:enumItem.name: FPEXC_bits_7_4_0_have_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_meaning

tcf:enumItem.description: FPEXC bits[7, 4:0] indicate the presence of trapped exceptions that have occurred at the time of the exception. All trapped exceptions that occurred at the time of the exception have their bits set.
tcf:enumItem.name: FPEXC_bits_7_4_0_indicate_the_presence_of_trapped_exceptions_that_have_occurred_at_the_time_of_the_exception

tcf:enumItem.description: Input denormal exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Input_denormal_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Input denormal exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Input_denormal_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Inexact exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Inexact_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Inexact exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Inexact_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Underflow exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Underflow_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Underflow exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Underflow_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Overflow exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Overflow_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Overflow exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Overflow_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Divide-by-zero exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Divide_by_zero_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Divide-by-zero exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Divide_by_zero_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Invalid Operation exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Invalid_Operation_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Invalid Operation exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Invalid_Operation_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: IEEE half-precision format selected.
tcf:enumItem.name: IEEE_half_precision_format_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Alternative half-precision format selected.
tcf:enumItem.name: Alternative_half_precision_format_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: NaN operands propagate through to the output of a floating-point operation.
tcf:enumItem.name: NaN_operands_propagate_through_to_the_output_of_a_floating_point_operation

tcf:enumItem.description: Any operation involving one or more NaNs returns the Default NaN.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_operation_involving_one_or_more_NaNs_returns_the_Default_NaN

tcf:enumItem.description: Flush-to-zero mode disabled. Behavior of the floating-point system is fully compliant with the IEEE 754 standard.
tcf:enumItem.name: Flush_to_zero_mode_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Flush-to-zero mode enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Flush_to_zero_mode_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Round to Nearest (RN) mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_to_Nearest_RN_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Round towards Plus Infinity (RP) mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_towards_Plus_Infinity_RP_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Round towards Minus Infinity (RM) mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_towards_Minus_Infinity_RM_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Round towards Zero (RZ) mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_towards_Zero_RZ_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the IDC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the IDC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the IDC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the IXC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the IXC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the IXC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the UFC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the UFC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the UFC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the OFC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the OFC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the OFC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the DZC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the DZC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the DZC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the IOC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the IOC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the IOC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: The system includes hardware support for floating-point instructions.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_system_includes_hardware_support_for_floating_point_instructions

tcf:enumItem.description: The system provides only software emulation of floating-point instructions.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_system_provides_only_software_emulation_of_floating_point_instructions

tcf:enumItem.description: VFPv1 architecture with an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED subarchitecture.
tcf:enumItem.name: VFPv1_architecture_with_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_subarchitecture

tcf:enumItem.description: VFPv2 architecture with Common VFP subarchitecture v1.
tcf:enumItem.name: VFPv2_architecture_with_Common_VFP_subarchitecture_v1

tcf:enumItem.description: VFPv3 architecture, or later, with Common VFP subarchitecture v2. The VFP architecture version is indicated by the MVFR0 and MVFR1 registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: VFPv3_architecture_or_later_with_Common_VFP_subarchitecture_v2

tcf:enumItem.description: VFPv3 architecture, or later, with Null subarchitecture. The entire floating-point implementation is in hardware, and no software support code is required. The VFP architecture version is indicated by the MVFR0 and MVFR1 registers. This value can be used only by an implementation that does not support the trap enable bits in the FPSCR.
tcf:enumItem.name: VFPv3_architecture_or_later_with_Null_subarchitecture

tcf:enumItem.description: VFPv3 architecture, or later, with Common VFP subarchitecture v3, and support for trap enable bits in FPSCR. The VFP architecture version is indicated by the MVFR0 and MVFR1 registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: VFPv3_architecture_or_later_with_Common_VFP_subarchitecture_v3_and_support_for_trap_enable_bits_in_FPSCR

tcf:enumItem.description: Only Round to Nearest mode supported, except that Round towards Zero mode is supported for VCVT instructions that always use that rounding mode regardless of the FPSCR setting.
tcf:enumItem.name: Only_Round_to_Nearest_mode_supported_except_that_Round_towards_Zero_mode_is_supported_for_VCVT_instructions_that_always_use_that_rounding_mode_regardless_of_the_FPSCR_setting

tcf:enumItem.description: All rounding modes supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_rounding_modes_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Short vectors not supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: Short_vectors_not_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Short vector operation supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: Short_vector_operation_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported by the hardware. When exception trapping is supported, support code is needed to handle the trapped exceptions.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_by_the_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv2.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv2

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv3, VFPv4, or ARMv8. VFPv3 and ARMv8 add an instruction to load a double-precision floating-point constant, and conversions between double-precision and fixed-point values.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv3_VFPv4_or_ARMv8

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv2.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv2

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv3 or VFPv4. VFPv3 adds an instruction to load a single-precision floating-point constant, and conversions between single-precision and fixed-point values.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv3_or_VFPv4

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, 16 x 64-bit registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_16_x_64_bit_registers

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, 32 x 64-bit registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_32_x_64_bit_registers

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Instructions to convert between half-precision and single-precision implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Instructions_to_convert_between_half_precision_and_single_precision_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: As for 0b0001, and also instructions to convert between half-precision and double-precision implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_for_0b0001_and_also_instructions_to_convert_between_half_precision_and_double_precision_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Implemented. This value is permitted only if the SIMDSP field is 0001.
tcf:enumItem.name: Implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Implemented. This value is permitted only if the SIMDInt field is 0001.
tcf:enumItem.name: Implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Hardware supports only the Default NaN mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hardware_supports_only_the_Default_NaN_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Hardware supports propagation of NaN values.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hardware_supports_propagation_of_NaN_values

tcf:enumItem.description: Hardware supports only the Flush-to-Zero mode of operation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hardware_supports_only_the_Flush_to_Zero_mode_of_operation

tcf:enumItem.description: Hardware supports full denormalized number arithmetic.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hardware_supports_full_denormalized_number_arithmetic

tcf:enumItem.description: No support for miscellaneous features.
tcf:enumItem.name: No_support_for_miscellaneous_features

tcf:enumItem.description: Support for Floating-point selection.
tcf:enumItem.name: Support_for_Floating_point_selection

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0001, and Floating-point Conversion to Integer with Directed Rounding modes.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0001_and_Floating_point_Conversion_to_Integer_with_Directed_Rounding_modes

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0010, and Floating-point Round to Integral Floating-point.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0010_and_Floating_point_Round_to_Integral_Floating_point

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0011, and Floating-point MaxNum and MinNum.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0011_and_Floating_point_MaxNum_and_MinNum

tcf:enumItem.description: No support for miscellaneous features.
tcf:enumItem.name: No_support_for_miscellaneous_features

tcf:enumItem.description: Floating-point Conversion to Integer with Directed Rounding modes.
tcf:enumItem.name: Floating_point_Conversion_to_Integer_with_Directed_Rounding_modes

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0001, and Floating-point Round to Integral Floating-point.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0001_and_Floating_point_Round_to_Integral_Floating_point

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0010, and Floating-point MaxNum and MinNum.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0010_and_Floating_point_MaxNum_and_MinNum
